name: Animaddicts 4
description:
In this game you have to climb objects in the scenario to try to climb as high as possible.

This is a game for people who like to test their skills and patience as it is a game that requires a lot of calm and skill.

This game is also for cartoon lovers as the visual art is from 80's cartoons.

Features and Content
  • One Character to choose and play
  • One Level with different obstacles to climb

In this current version of the game is possible choose a player as well as in this current version of the game the player have a level to play.
In the current version of the game, all the game mechanics are already finished and what we will do is add more objects for the player to climb in the currentl existing level.
